name: Vitamin C Serum
tagline: Wake up to brighter, more radiant skin
description: Our potent Vitamin C Serum is your daily dose of glow. Formulated with 15% pure L-Ascorbic Acid, it penetrates deep into your skin to fade dark spots, even out skin tone, and protect against environmental damage. Perfect for your morning routine.
howToUse: Apply 3-4 drops to clean, dry skin every morning before moisturizer. Follow with sunscreen. Avoid mixing with retinol.

name: Hydrating Toner
description: This alcohol-free toner is a hydration hero. Infused with pure Rose Water and Glycerin, it preps your skin to absorb serums better while delivering an instant boost of moisture. Your skin feels plump, soft, and ready for the day.
howToUse: After cleansing, pour onto palms or cotton pad and gently pat into skin. Use morning and night. Can be layered for extra hydration.
keyBenefits: Preps skin for better serum absorption

name: Gel Cleanser
tagline: Deep clean without stripping your skin
description: A gentle yet effective gel cleanser that removes dirt, oil, and impurities without over-drying. Salicylic Acid works to unclog pores while Aloe Vera keeps skin calm and balanced. Your skin feels fresh, not tight.
howToUse: Massage onto damp skin in circular motions for 60 seconds. Rinse with lukewarm water. Use morning and night.

name: Night Cream
tagline: Let your skin repair while you sleep
description: This rich, nourishing night cream works with your skin's natural repair cycle. Peptides boost collagen production while Shea Butter deeply moisturizes. Wake up to visibly plumper, softer, and more youthful-looking skin.
howToUse: Apply generously to face and neck as the last step of your PM routine. Massage upward until absorbed. Use nightly for best results.

name: Clay Mask
description: This powerful yet gentle clay mask draws out impurities, excess oil, and toxins from deep within your pores. Kaolin Clay purifies while Green Tea soothes, leaving your skin feeling incredibly clean without tightness.
howToUse: Apply an even layer to clean, dry skin. Leave for 10-15 minutes until dry. Rinse with warm water. Use 1-2 times per week.

name: Tinted Sunscreen SPF 50
description: More than just sunscreen. This lightweight, tinted formula provides broad-spectrum SPF 50 protection while evening out your skin tone. No white cast, no greasy feel – just smooth, protected, natural-looking skin.
howToUse: Apply liberally as the last step of your morning routine. Reapply every 2-3 hours when outdoors. Suitable under makeup.
notFor: Very fair or very dark skin tones (check shade match)

name: Under Eye Cream
description: The delicate under-eye area needs special care. Our lightweight eye cream with Caffeine instantly depuffs while Peptides work over time to reduce dark circles and fine lines. Look well-rested, even when you're not.
howToUse: Gently pat a small amount around the orbital bone using your ring finger. Use morning and night. Avoid getting into eyes.
notFor: Those with eye sensitivities (patch test first)

name: Cleansing Balm
tagline: Melt away makeup, keep your glow
description: This luxurious cleansing balm transforms from solid to oil on contact, dissolving even waterproof makeup and SPF effortlessly. Jojoba Oil nourishes while Vitamin E protects, leaving skin soft and never stripped.
howToUse: Massage onto dry skin to dissolve makeup. Add water to emulsify, then rinse. Follow with water-based cleanser for double cleanse.
keyBenefits: Perfect first step in double cleanse

name: Facial Oil - Rosehip
tagline: Nature's answer to scars and aging
description: Cold-pressed Rosehip Oil is packed with Vitamin A and essential fatty acids that help fade scars, reduce hyperpigmentation, and fight signs of aging. A few drops mixed with your moisturizer work wonders overnight.
howToUse: Apply 2-3 drops to face and neck at night. Can be used alone or mixed with moisturizer. Best used in PM routine.

name: Glow Starter Kit
tagline: Everything you need to start your glow journey
description: New to skincare? Start here. This complete kit includes our bestselling Vitamin C Serum, Hydrating Toner, and Gel Moisturizer – everything you need for a simple yet effective routine that delivers visible results.
howToUse: AM: Toner → Vitamin C Serum → Moisturizer → Sunscreen. PM: Cleanser → Toner → Moisturizer. Follow for 4 weeks for best results.
notFor: Those with specific skin concerns needing targeted treatment

name: Cream Cleanser
description: A milky, non-foaming cleanser perfect for dry and sensitive skin. Ceramides strengthen your skin barrier while cleansing, and Glycolic Acid provides gentle exfoliation without irritation. Your skin feels clean, soft, and never tight.
howToUse: Massage onto damp skin for 30-60 seconds. Rinse with lukewarm water or wipe off with a damp cloth. Use morning and/or night.
notFor: Very oily skin wanting deep cleanse

name: Foaming Face Wash
tagline: Fresh, clean skin without the squeaky feel
description: Love that fresh, clean feeling? This foaming cleanser delivers satisfying lather that removes oil and impurities without stripping. Tea Tree Oil fights acne-causing bacteria while Glycerin keeps skin balanced.
howToUse: Pump 1-2 times onto wet hands, lather, and massage onto face. Rinse thoroughly. Use morning and night.

name: Oil Cleanser
tagline: The secret to truly clean skin
description: Oil dissolves oil – that's the science behind this effective cleanser. Argan and Coconut oils melt away makeup, sunscreen, and sebum while nourishing your skin. The perfect first step in your double cleanse routine.
howToUse: Apply to dry skin and massage for 1-2 minutes. Add water to emulsify (turns milky). Rinse and follow with water-based cleanser.

name: Exfoliating Toner
description: This gentle daily exfoliant combines Salicylic and Lactic Acid to unclog pores and smooth texture without harsh scrubbing. Use it consistently and watch your skin transform – clearer, smoother, more radiant.
howToUse: Apply with cotton pad to clean skin at night. Start 2-3 times per week, gradually increase. Always use sunscreen the next day.

name: Face Mist
description: Keep this in your bag for instant hydration throughout the day. Pure Rose Water and Lavender calm stressed skin while providing a refreshing pick-me-up. Perfect over makeup or on bare skin.
howToUse: Close eyes and mist onto face from 6-8 inches away. Use anytime – before makeup, over makeup, or whenever skin feels dry.

name: Balancing Toner
description: Oily in some areas, dry in others? This balancing toner is your solution. Witch Hazel controls oil production in your T-zone while Aloe Vera hydrates drier areas. Your skin finds its perfect balance.
howToUse: Apply with cotton pad or hands after cleansing. Focus on oily areas. Use morning and night.

name: Retinol Serum
description: Retinol is proven to reduce wrinkles, boost collagen, and improve skin texture. Our encapsulated retinol formula delivers powerful results with minimal irritation. Start slow and watch years fade away.
howToUse: Apply 2-3 drops at night to clean, dry skin. Start 1-2 times per week, gradually increase. Always use sunscreen during the day.

name: Hyaluronic Acid Serum
description: Hyaluronic Acid can hold 1000 times its weight in water – and this serum delivers it straight to your skin. Multiple molecular weights ensure hydration at every level. Plump, bouncy, dewy skin in seconds.
howToUse: Apply to damp skin for best results. Use 2-3 drops morning and night before moisturizer. Can be layered.

name: Niacinamide Serum
description: Niacinamide does it all – controls oil, minimizes pores, fades dark spots, and strengthens skin barrier. Our 10% formula with Zinc is the ultimate multitasker for clearer, calmer, more balanced skin.
howToUse: Apply 2-3 drops to clean skin morning and/or night. Layer under moisturizer. Plays well with most ingredients.
notFor: Those using high-strength Vitamin C (use at different times)

name: Spot Treatment
description: Woke up with a pimple before a big day? This targeted treatment shrinks spots fast. Salicylic Acid dives deep into pores while Tea Tree Oil kills bacteria. Apply at night, wake up to visibly smaller spots.
howToUse: Apply a small amount directly on spots at night. Let dry before moisturizer. Use until spot disappears.

name: Day Cream
tagline: Moisturize and protect in one step
description: Why layer moisturizer and sunscreen when you can do both? This lightweight day cream provides SPF 30 protection plus all-day hydration. Perfect for those who want a simplified morning routine.
howToUse: Apply generously as the last step of your morning routine. Reapply sunscreen if spending extended time outdoors.

name: Gel Moisturizer
description: For those who hate heavy creams, this gel moisturizer is a dream. Water-light texture absorbs instantly, delivering serious hydration without any greasiness. Your skin feels fresh, bouncy, and perfectly balanced.
howToUse: Apply to face and neck after serum. Use morning and night. Can be layered for extra hydration.
notFor: Very dry skin needing rich moisture

name: Rich Cream / Barrier Cream
tagline: Repair and protect your skin barrier
description: When your skin barrier is compromised, everything else fails. This rich cream packed with Ceramides and Shea Butter repairs and strengthens your barrier, locking in moisture and keeping irritants out.
howToUse: Apply to face and neck as the last step of your routine. Use morning and night. Extra helpful in winter or after active treatments.

name: Oil-Free Moisturizer
description: Oily and acne-prone skin needs moisture too – just the right kind. This oil-free formula hydrates while Niacinamide and Salicylic Acid control oil and prevent breakouts. Matte finish, happy skin.
howToUse: Apply to face after serum. Use morning and night. Works great under makeup.

name: Mineral Sunscreen SPF 50
tagline: Safe for you, safe for the planet
description: Physical UV filters (Zinc Oxide) sit on top of skin and reflect harmful rays. This reef-safe, mineral sunscreen provides SPF 50 protection without harsh chemicals. Gentle enough for sensitive skin and kids.
howToUse: Apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure. Reapply every 2 hours or after swimming/sweating.
notFor: Those who dislike slight white cast (tinted version available)

name: Matte Sunscreen SPF 40
description: Finally, a sunscreen made for oily skin. This matte-finish formula provides SPF 40 protection while absorbing excess oil throughout the day. No shine, no greasy feel, just protected skin.
howToUse: Apply as the last step of morning routine. Reapply every 2-3 hours when outdoors. Can be used under makeup.
bestFor: Those who skip sunscreen due to greasiness

name: Sheet Mask
description: Self-care made easy. These serum-soaked sheet masks deliver an intense dose of hydration and brightening ingredients. Perfect before a special occasion or whenever your skin needs extra love.
howToUse: Apply to clean, dry face. Leave on for 15-20 minutes. Remove and pat excess serum into skin. No rinsing needed.

name: Overnight Mask
description: While you sleep, this mask works overtime. Retinol stimulates cell renewal while Vitamin C brightens, so you wake up with visibly smoother, more radiant skin. It's like 8 hours of treatment in one product.
howToUse: Apply as the last step of PM routine, 2-3 times per week. Leave on overnight and rinse in the morning.

name: Peel-off Mask
description: There's something satisfying about peeling off a mask and seeing cleaner skin underneath. Charcoal draws out impurities from pores while the peel action removes dead skin cells. Instant clean feeling.
howToUse: Apply an even layer avoiding eye area and lips. Let dry completely (15-20 minutes). Peel off from edges. Use once a week.

name: Face Scrub
description: Sometimes your skin needs physical exfoliation to feel truly clean. Ultra-fine sugar granules gently buff away dead cells while Vitamin C brightens. Your skin is left smooth, soft, and ready to absorb your products better.
howToUse: Massage gently onto damp skin in circular motions. Avoid eye area. Rinse thoroughly. Use 1-2 times per week.

name: Chemical Exfoliant (AHA/BHA)
description: No scrubbing needed. This powerful yet gentle formula combines Glycolic Acid (AHA) to resurface skin and Salicylic Acid (BHA) to unclog pores from within. The result? Smoother, clearer, more refined skin.
howToUse: Apply to clean, dry skin at night. Start once a week, gradually increase. Always use sunscreen the next day. Avoid other actives on same night.

name: Enzyme Peel
description: Enzymes from Papaya naturally dissolve dead skin cells without any acids or scrubbing. This is the gentlest exfoliation method, perfect for sensitive skin or those new to exfoliation. Smooth, bright skin without irritation.
howToUse: Apply to clean, dry skin. Leave for 10 minutes. Rinse with lukewarm water. Use 1-2 times per week.

name: Facial Brush
description: Soft silicone bristles vibrate to remove dirt, oil, and makeup residue your hands can't reach. Gentle enough for daily use, this brush makes cleansing more effective without irritation. Your cleanser works 10x better.
howToUse: Apply cleanser to damp face. Use brush in circular motions for 60 seconds. Rinse brush after each use. Clean brush weekly.

name: Jade Roller
tagline: Ancient beauty ritual for modern glow
description: This cooling jade stone tool has been used for centuries in Chinese skincare. Roll it over your face to boost circulation, reduce puffiness, and help products absorb better. Store in the fridge for extra depuffing power.
howToUse: Roll outward and upward from center of face. Use over serum or moisturizer for better glide. Store in fridge for cooling effect.

name: Gua Sha
description: This traditional Chinese tool provides facial massage that sculpts, lifts, and relieves tension. Regular use can help define jawline, reduce puffiness, and give your face a natural lift. Self-care that actually works.
howToUse: Apply facial oil for glide. Use gentle pressure, scraping outward from center. Follow online tutorials for proper technique.

name: LED Facial Device
description: Red light boosts collagen, blue light kills acne bacteria. This at-home LED device brings professional light therapy to your bathroom. Just 10 minutes a day can visibly improve your skin over time.
howToUse: Use on clean, bare skin. Select mode (red for aging, blue for acne). Hold to face for 10 minutes. Use 3-5 times per week.

name: Glow Kit
description: Everything you need to achieve that lit-from-within glow. This kit targets pigmentation, dullness, and uneven skin tone with our most powerful brightening products. See visible results in 4 weeks.
howToUse: AM: Cleanser → Vitamin C Serum → Moisturizer → SPF. PM: Cleanser → Niacinamide Serum → Night Mask (2x/week). Follow for 4-6 weeks.
notFor: Those with very sensitive skin (patch test first)

name: Acne Kit
description: Battling breakouts? This targeted kit addresses every step of acne treatment – from gentle cleansing to spot treatment to oil control. Clinically effective ingredients, gentle enough for daily use.
howToUse: AM: Foaming Cleanser → Oil-Free Moisturizer → Matte Sunscreen. PM: Foaming Cleanser → Spot Treatment on active spots → Oil-Free Moisturizer.

name: AM/PM Skincare Set
description: Different needs for day and night. This comprehensive set includes everything for both routines – antioxidant protection by day, repair and renewal by night. Your skin is covered 24/7.
howToUse: AM: Cleanser → Vitamin C → Day Cream. PM: Cleanser → Retinol → Night Cream. See individual products for detailed instructions.
keyBenefits: Protects by day, repairs by night

name: Starter Kit
description: New to skincare? Start simple. This no-fuss kit has just three products – cleanser, moisturizer, and sunscreen. Master the basics before adding actives. Simple, effective, impossible to mess up.
howToUse: AM: Cleanser → Moisturizer → Sunscreen. PM: Cleanser → Moisturizer. That's it! Add actives later once you've built the habit.
notFor: Those with specific skin concerns needing treatment

name: Lip Balm
description: Dry, chapped lips? This nourishing balm with Beeswax and Vitamin E creates a protective barrier while healing cracked skin. Keep it in your pocket, your bag, your desk – you'll want it everywhere.
howToUse: Apply to lips as needed throughout the day. Use before lipstick for smoother application. Apply at night for intensive treatment.

name: Cleansing Oil
tagline: The first step to truly clean skin
description: Lightweight oil that transforms into a milky emulsion when mixed with water. Dissolves makeup, SPF, and excess sebum effortlessly. The essential first step of the Korean double cleanse method.
howToUse: Massage onto dry skin for 1-2 minutes. Add water to emulsify. Rinse and follow with water-based cleanser.
notFor: Those who prefer foam/gel cleansers only

name: Rosehip Oil
description: 100% cold-pressed Rosehip Oil is rich in Vitamin A (natural retinol) and essential fatty acids. It fades scars, evens skin tone, and deeply nourishes without feeling heavy. Your skin's overnight repair treatment.
howToUse: Apply 2-3 drops to face at night. Can be used alone or mixed with moisturizer. Best used in PM routine.

name: Jojoba Oil
tagline: The oil closest to your skin's own
description: Jojoba oil is technically a wax that closely mimics your skin's natural sebum. This means it balances oil production – adding moisture to dry skin and actually helping oily skin produce less oil.
howToUse: Apply 2-3 drops to damp skin after cleansing or mix with moisturizer. Can be used morning and night. Also great for hair!
